author: Julian de Féral
description: Walnut, celery and apple are essential elements to both a Waldorf Salad and this tasty Daiquiri.
name: Waldorf Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
15 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE celery in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
